name: George Men's Faraday Oxford Dress Shoe

reviews.name: George Men's Faraday Oxford Dress Shoe
reviews.reviewText: He loves them & they are exactly what's in the picture..
reviews.title: For my husband

reviews.name: George Men's Faraday Oxford Dress Shoe
reviews.reviewText: Excellent shoes. Just as good as my $130 banana republic shoes in terms of style and comfort. Thanks a lot for fast delivery.
reviews.title: Shoes

reviews.name: George Men's Faraday Oxford Dress Shoe
reviews.reviewText: The shoes aren't amazing but for the price you really can't beat the product. I would definitely buy these if your in a pinch or on a budget
reviews.title: Great value

reviews.name: George Men's Faraday Oxford Dress Shoe
reviews.reviewText:
We were going on a family vacation and my son needed dress shoes. I did not want to spend a lot of money because he is a growing boy.
They were perfit. Great find.
reviews.title: Great look
